main event: A large, lane-shaped object was observed over Gower, Missouri on August 7.
interesting points: The object was described as 30-40 feet long and 10-12 feet high., It had a metallic surface with a bluish-white glow around the midsection., The observation lasted for 1 minute and 15 seconds., The object made a steep climb and left the area without making any sound., No vapor trail or exhaust was observed as the object disappeared.
